input_args.passage: 'American | The greatest fiction books since 1950(1 to 50) determined by 130 lists and articles from various critics, authors and experts.'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we see that Elie Wiesel was a Mellon Professor in the Humanities at Boston University where he taught “Literature of Memory.” In addition to this, he was also the Chairman of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.'
